name: Wizards vs Builders
description:
This game was created as part of a challenge to create as many games as possible in 30 days using a random generator to determine what type of game it is! This is game #2 of the challenge and took me 2.5 days to create. 

This games randomized results where a Theme of Fantasy, a Genre of Fighting, and a Goal to Build! 

You are a wizard and need to fight over a building helmet to gain the power to BUILD! Once you have obtained this power, head back to your base. First Wizard to build their tower WINS!

Controls: 

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Left arrow key - Punch

Right arrow key - shoot
